item.description:
At the BAC, we go all night ... well, until one in the morning at least! Join us on Friday, May 16 to carry on the AIA Convention party until the wee hours. Free entry. Live music and DJs. Cash bar. Snacks. What more could you ask for?

Prom queen attire to flip-flop casual recommended: we leave it up to you.

This is a 21+ event only. Consider your ID mandatory.

The closest T stop is the Hynes Convention Center. For more information, visit www.the-bac.edu or call 617-585-0203.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the social butterfly running around in heels between the entrance and dance floor.
item.why: We talk about anyone who doesn't show up.
item.name: THE AFTER PARTY
